bioAsHtml: A former Sun/Oracle R&D employee. Currently, Denis is working for JetBrains s.r.o. Although his main responsibilities are in the UI area he set up OpenJDK builds to be used as a runtime for JetBrains products. Denis has considerable experience in developing OpenJDK source base.

acceptedTalks.title: OpenJDK - Not just a set of APIs

bio: A former Sun/Oracle R&D employee. Currently, Denis is working for JetBrains s.r.o. Although his main responsibilities are in the UI area he set up OpenJDK builds to be used as a runtime for JetBrains products. Denis has considerable experience in developing OpenJDK source base.
